attributes.action: Stop all plans to change meat hygiene enforcement in UK slaughterhouses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned, would like to strongly object to the proposed transformation of the ‘Meat Hygiene Service’, with the proposed developed plans for piloting an alternative delivery model to a private sector control body or bodies. 
We feel this will not protect the consumer; that taking the official controls from the public sector will adversely have an impact on the consumer through reduced food safety and standards,in particular we feel the private sector do not have the ability to manage disease outbreaks

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop all plans to change meat hygiene enforcement in UK slaughterhouses."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15689.asp

Prime Minister's Office
